ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Charm Change
ygData.msgSnippet: I was under the impression that this changed along with the major experience changes a couple months back? Could be wrong, but I really do remember a quote as
ygData.messageBody:
I was under the impression that this changed along with the major experience
changes a couple months back?

Could be wrong, but I really do remember a quote as saying pets take no exp,
with no qualifications given.

Atonal

-----Original Message-----
From: Matt DeBarger [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: Monday, May 14, 2001 3:55 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Charm Change


Mage pets used to definitly take 50% of the xp if they outdamged the group.
I tested this myself way back in the day when I was a mage. The odds of a
mage pet outdamaging the group is really slim... I have never seen how this
applies when there are multiple pets...
